text:
@ABC Seriously, @ABC How About acting as an actual news organization & not sensationalizing these minority uprisings organized by White Nationalist terrorist groups & funded by wealthy far right foundations?
Why legitimize this? Do YOU want these Typhoid Marys spreading COVID19?
